word_mean: 脊柱前凸：侧面看，腰椎和颈椎之弯曲前凹。本词适用于有关增加弯度的异常：如脊柱前凸，鞍背及摇摆背，以及有关的正常弯曲(正常脊柱前凸)。参见kyphosis及scoliosis

sentence.Network_en: Previous research has indicated that number of factors may change the lordosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 以往的研究已经表明,一些因素可能改变前凸.

sentence.Network_en: Postoperative radiographic features, including fusion status and segmental lordosis, were also examined.
sentence.Network_cn: 也审查了术后放射线功能, 其中包括融合现状及节段性前凸.

sentence.Network_en: Fusion rate, segmental lordosis , and disc height were assessed by roentgenography.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过X线评价融合率 、 阶段性脊柱前凸和椎间盘高度.

（1）亦称脊柱前弯（lordosis）。指脊柱的矢面上前方的凸弯。
极端的背部下凹称为脊柱前弯症（lordosis），胸部和上背部向后部严重突起。背部下凹的姿势给予腰部很大的压力，并可能导致严重 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek lordōsis, from lordos 'bent backwards'

means.word_mean: 1. an abnormal inward (forward) curvature of the vertebral column
